name: Wubbo Alien Shooter
description:
Wubbo is stuck on an alien planet. His lander capsule does not have the power to get him back to earth and the inhabitants don't want him on their planet. 

CONTROLS:

Use WASD to walk around, point and click to shoot. 

easter egg: press Q to get a flamethrower!

Let me know what you think in the comments, if there's any potential in this prototype I might develop it further and start a video devlog where I implement your suggestions.
